description: Confirmation of works to implement planning permission reference 202604FUL dated 14/01/2022 in accordance with S.56 (4) of the Town and Country planning Act 1990 (as amended) for redevelopment to provide: Excavation to form basement level with light wells and sunken courtyard to provide single self-contained flat (for a total of three); associated amenity, cycle storage, and waste storage spaces; internal alterations to layout of ground floor flat; alterations to ground floor side (west) elevation involving removal of window opening and installation of glazed doors, to rear (south) elevations involving replacing door opening with window, and removal of window opening; and raising height of parapet wall to ground floor rear extension (Lawful Development Certificate for an Existing Development)
decision_conditions: Satisfactory evidence has been submitted, as required under s191 of the Town and Country Planning Act (1990), to demonstrate that the works that have been undertaken would constitute a material operation as defined by s56(4) of the Town and Country Planning Act. The development approved under Planning Application ref: 202604FUL, dated 14/01/2022 has accordingly been lawfully implemented in accordance with the time limits outlined by Condition 1 of this consent.
The Planning Permission must be carried out in accordance with all other conditions and requirements under the legal agreement that are attached to this consent.
